title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 167-1.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 167-1.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

Unless otherwise stated, as used in this Part: (a) Division shall mean the New York State

Division for Youth. (b) Director
shall mean the director of the division or the director's designee. (c) Facility shall mean a secure facility, which is a residential facility characterized by restricting construction, hardware, and procedures, and is designated by the division as a secure
facility. (d) Facility director
shall mean the director of a secure facility or the secure facility director's
designee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
167-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
